tasks.name: Install and configure @heroicons/react type definitions
tasks.description: Install @heroicons/react v2.0.18 package and configure TypeScript to recognize the type definitions. This will resolve import errors in deployment components (CostEstimator, DeploymentMonitor, RollbackControl).
tasks.notes: This is a straightforward package installation that will immediately resolve 3 import errors
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Run npm install @heroicons/react@2.0.18
2. Verify installation in package.json
3. Test imports in affected components
4. Run tsc --noEmit to validate no import errors remain
tasks.verificationCriteria: tsc --noEmit should not show @heroicons import errors
tasks.analysisResult: TypeScript Type Safety Audit for AI Development Cockpit - Systematically resolve 213 compilation errors across 5 domains to achieve full type safety compliance. Focus on maintaining backward compatibility while improving type strictness.

tasks.name: Fix SessionInfo interface and related types
tasks.description: Extend SessionInfo interface with missing properties (created_at, last_activity, device_info, location_info, id) and update all consumers to handle these properties correctly.
tasks.notes: This fixes 15+ errors related to session management
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Locate SessionInfo interface definition
2. Add missing properties with appropriate types
3. Update SessionManager component to use correct property names
4. Fix useSessionManager hook imports from lib/session
tasks.verificationCriteria: All SessionInfo property errors resolved in SessionManager.tsx
tasks.analysisResult: TypeScript Type Safety Audit for AI Development Cockpit - Systematically resolve 213 compilation errors across 5 domains to achieve full type safety compliance. Focus on maintaining backward compatibility while improving type strictness.
tasks.summary: Successfully fixed all SessionInfo interface and related authentication type errors. Extended SessionInfo interface with missing properties (created_at, last_activity, device_info, location_info, id), created DeviceInfo and LocationInfo interfaces, implemented comprehensive session utility functions including security analysis, and fixed all property access errors in SessionManager.tsx. All SessionInfo-related TypeScript compilation errors have been resolved.

tasks.name: Standardize VLLMService method naming

2. Update ModernChatInterface.tsx line 149
3. Update useInference.ts line 396

tasks.summary: Successfully standardized VLLMService method naming to 'generateStreamingText' across all files. Updated the main method and private helper methods (generateStreamingTextOpenAI, generateStreamingTextNative) in VLLMService, and ensured all callers use the consistent naming convention. Method naming is now uniform across ModernChatInterface.tsx, useInference.ts, and chat page.

tasks.summary: Successfully created comprehensive PWA type definitions in src/types/global.d.ts. Extended Navigator interface with standalone property for PWA detection, added SyncManager interface for background sync functionality, enhanced ServiceWorkerRegistration with sync property, and included window.backgroundSync API types. All PWA components now compile without Navigator property errors.
